The female knight comes back to her senses. She seems
to be in a very bad condition...
"Pleasure. I'm Jeanne... from the Kingdom of Rondon."
"I guess I have you to thank for saving me..."
"I'm Jeanne from the Kingdom of Rondon."
"Now it would be polite to introduce yourself too."
"I guess I have you to thank for saving me..."
"Really, this is how it is going to be?"
"Well thank you for saving me in any case... I guess being
polite has nothing to do with that."
"I think I remember what happened... We were getting to
the lower levels of the prison."
"There was a small party of us... We came down here to the
"We were meant to save the brother of one of our comrades.
He was serving at the dungeons of fear and hunger as the
"Several days ago we got a plead for help from the dungeons.
"Our party was separated already at the first floors of the
dungeon. We were thrown in the midst of chaos right from the
"Me and the dark knight Seril ended up together and when
we couldn't find the others, we decided to dwell lower..."
"We were then ambushed by a creature with a head of a
"I have no idea what happened to Seril, but I hid in the
catacombs, only to be found out by that hairy beast later
Jeanne coughs blood. She looks to be in serious pain.
"It might be a bit too much to ask, but could you help me
to the upper floors of the dungeon?"
"We were supposed to re-group at the basement area."
"I'm afraid I'm in a way too bad of a shape to get there
"I know it's a big detour from here... but..."
"I'm sure I can make it on my own too..."
"You know, I changed my mind. I don't even want your help."
"You know, I changed my mind. I don't even want your help."
"I just need to catch my breath first..."
There is a terrified look on the face of Jeanne.
